title: Think you are being held back by afkers and bad teammates? Click here to find out!

replies.body: omg feeder evry game gg cant carry fk elo hell this gam suks my team afker wtf  fix ur system riot
You were actually referring to bad/troll team mates. Hypocrite.

PROMOS.

PROMOS DO U NOT KNOW WHAT THE HELL THEY ARE? Oh thats right u got carried by ur duo

For someone thinking hes top %%%% ur actually pre dumb. In that thread i was referring to promos and how i believe the matchmaking for promos is corrupt, not non promo games. I am completely fine with non promo games, and i climbed didnt i? To gold. Git gud
Are you actually that %%%%%%ed? You still complained about getting bad team mates, and then you make this thread. Give me proof that I got carried, please.

Wtf, i pointed it out to u a few days ago. YOu went on some 3rd smurf and duod with some guy and he carried u hard lel.

Proves u are silver/ bronze and cant carry yourself from bronze to plat??

Are u even plat in the first place? Boosted? Carried Lelllllllllll
